definitions.definition: A hinged bridge which can be raised (to prevent its being crossed, as across a moat , or to allow watercraft to travel beneath it).
A tendency to provide only limited access.

main_definition: A hinged bridge which can be raised (to prevent its being crossed, as across a moat , or to allow watercraft to travel beneath it).
secondary_definitions: ( figurative , attributive ) A tendency to provide only limited access.
